item.description:
Back by popular demand in Hartford Black Professionals is proud to restart the full season of our signature networking events. Urban Professionals from across the state will meet downtown Hartford at one CT's top venues - The Emperor at the Linden . Smooth Jazz & R&B, Light appetizers, and great networking opportunities. This event is a FREE event so feel free to invite friends & co-workers. After the networking, feel free to enjoy the rest of the night with a special guest DJ Rob Lo from New York. You must arrive by 7pm for FREE admission - Includes admisson to the special after party. Tell a friend and spread the word !

The Emperor at the Linden 6:00-9:00pm 10 Capitol Ave. Hartford CT 06103

SAVE THE DATE - SATURDAY APRIL 25TH, 2009
item.name: The Hartford Black Professionals Meetup
